column2: "Hey, you made it back in one piece, huh? Your report checks out, so I'd say everything went just fine."
"If you keep wielding knuckles like that, you won't have anything to worry about."
"Oh, and go ahead and keep the knuckles I gave you. They're all yours."
"Well, see you around, pal. Keep practicing with those knuckles."
"Barbara has issued a client order.  Barbara is in the gate area central hall."
